game.title: Unicorn Rescue
game.objective: Rescue the captured unicorns from the dark castle.
game.description: The dark wizard has captured several unicorns and holds them prisoner in his castle. You must rescue them before it's too late.

task.objective: Find and equip the magical unicorn armor.
task.description: The magical unicorn armor can be found hidden within the Enchanted Forest. It will protect you from the dark wizard's magic.

task.objective: Travel to the dark wizard's castle and locate the captured unicorns.
task.description: The dark wizard's castle is located on a remote island. You will need to use a ship to reach it.

task.objective: Confront the dark wizard and defeat his minions.
task.description: The dark wizard will not willingly surrender the unicorns. You will have to fight your way through hordes of his minions to reach him.

task.objective: Rescue the unicorns and lead them to safety.
task.description: Once the dark wizard is defeated, you must rescue the unicorns and lead them back to safety. Be careful, as the dark wizard's minions may still be lurking nearby.
